work: Epistle to the Son of the Wolf
author: Baha'u'llah
source_text: قل الهی الهی زيّن راسی باکليل العدل و هيکلی بطراز الانصاف انّک انت مالک المواهب و الالطاف *
translation: Say: "O God, my God! Attire mine head with the crown of justice, and my temple with the ornament of equity. Thou, verily, art the Possessor of all gifts and bounties."
